name: Dicey Loop
description:
Do you like Synthwave music and shooting stuff?!

Well, then you are right here because Dicey Loops includes both.

Features include:

  • Randomized Guns
  • Randomized Levels
  • Endless Gamemode
  • A nice Synthwave Style

So if all of these things sounded good to you, you can download the game and try it out yourself. The game is free to download and currently available for Windows. 

It's far away from Bug-free, but the game was developed in a few days, so that's to be expected.

This game was developed for the IFgameSH Summer Jam 2022

Controls

WASD - Movement 

Space - Jump

E - Interact

Left Click - Shoot

R - Reload

I - Inventory

CREDITS

Development: Vladi, Maik, Jan

Sci-Fi Character Portraits: Ashen Victor- Itch Project Page
